column1: ChaguoMoja is a robust Android application designed to simplify the voting process
column2: offering a user-friendly interface and leveraging cutting-edge technologies like Firebase for a seamless and efficient voting experience.

column1: ChaguoMoja is built using Android Studio
column2: with Firebase integration for backend functionalities. The app streamlines the voting process
column3: ensuring a smooth and intuitive experience for users.

column1: Follow these steps to set up and run ChaguoMoja on your local environment:
2. Open the project in Android Studio.
3. Configure Firebase credentials in the `google-services.json` file.
4. Build and run the application on an emulator or physical device.

column2: make sure to set up the necessary configurations
column3: such as Firebase credentials and any other relevant settings.

column1: Explore ChaguoMoja and take advantage of its user-friendly interface for a smooth voting experience.
We welcome contributions to enhance ChaguoMoja! If you have suggestions
